poemsDataJson.list_full: やすらはで 寝(ね)なましものを さ夜(よ)更(ふ)けて かたぶくまでの 月(つき)を見(み)しかな
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Better to have slept//Care-free, than to keep vain watch//Through the passing night,//Till I saw the lonely moon//Traverse her descending path.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Yasurawade|Nena mashi monoo|Sayo fukete|Katabuku made no|Tsuki o mishi kana
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: かたふくまての つきをみしかな
poemsDataJson.author: 赤染衛門(あかぞめえもん)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 来ると約束して来なかった男への恨み言
